title: Pair of Mandarin Squares
description: Pair of gold k\'ossu mandarin squares.  The central motif is a crane?  Standing on a rock that emerges from the Eternal Sea.  In the field are branches of peach and peony, bats, tight-headed clouds, and the sun.  Colors include blue, red, pink, green, and yellow.  Some painted details.  Lining of blue silk.  Inscriptions.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
